scene_hint.0: A man strides towards a helicopter.
scene_hint.1: A middle-aged man with white hair appears, with an industrial box beside him.
scene_hint.2: The man with black hair boards the helicopter.
scene_hint.3: The camera shifts back to the white-haired man, who seems hesitant to speak.
scene_hint.4: The man with black hair sits in the helicopter, smiling as the door closes.
scene_hint.5: The white-haired man stands silently, his hair slightly blown by the wind.
scene_hint.6: The helicopter ascends into the sky.
scene_hint.7: The camera focuses on the man with black hair inside the helicopter.
scene_hint.8: The man with black hair looks to the side and grips his arm.
scene_hint.9: His hand presses a button, and the man dons armor and flies out of the helicopter, followed by the appearance of a spaceship.
scene_hint.10: Iron Man and Captain America stand in a confrontational pose in the background, with text displayed on the screen.
